sentences.sContent: The classic example is tossing a pancake so it flips over in mid-air.
sentences.sContent_eng: The classic example is tossing a pancake so it flips over in mid-air.
sentences.sCn: 最经典的例子是摊薄饼的时候，颠勺时薄饼就会飞到半空中。

sentences.sContent: The package says baking and pancake mix, but the pancakes were not tasty without some major tweaking to the recipe.
sentences.sContent_eng: The package says baking and pancake mix, but the pancakes were not tasty without some major tweaking to the recipe.
sentences.sCn: 包装盒上说烤焙与薄饼面料混合，但没有添加一些主要调料，薄饼是不好吃的。

sentences.sContent: They are so-called “ pancake people ”, they no longer concentrate their energies on one area of interest, but instead choose to spread themselves thinly over a large area.
sentences.sContent_eng: They are so-called “ pancake people ”, they no longer concentrate their energies on one area of interest, but instead choose to spread themselves thinly over a large area.
sentences.sCn: 他们就是所谓的“煎饼人”，他们不再将精力专注于某一个感兴趣的领域，而是让自己的关注点浅浅地散布在一个很大的范围。

synos.tran: 薄烤饼；粉饼；平降（全称pancake landing）

remMethod.val: pan(平底锅)+cake(饼)→平底锅上煎饼→薄煎饼

trans.tranOther: a thin flat round cake made from flour, milk, and eggs, that has been cooked in a flat pan and is eaten hot
